function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Presence of virus on particulate particles in severely air pollute area","Impact":"Increased risk of respiratory complications and virus transmission","Mitigation":"Use of masks even inside home, reduction of air pollution","Technologies":"Air purifiers, filtration systems, mask technologies","People":"Residents in severely air polluted areas, individuals with respiratory conditions","Owner":"Local governments, environmental agencies"},{"Description":"Cleaner air due to lockdowns against coronavirus","Impact":"Positive environmental effects but potential pause on modern social life","Mitigation":"Balancing environmental benefits with social and economic needs","Technologies":"Air quality monitoring, emission control technologies","People":"Global population, individuals living in lockdown areas","Owner":"Local and national governments, environmental agencies"}]}
